full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO BZLOG BSGYUR MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES LHA MO'I BZLOG PA BYAS NAS SBYIN BDAG GIS PHYOGS NGAN LA ME LA BSREG ,MJUG GI CHOG DKYUS BZHIN BYA'O, ,ZHES PA 'DI NAS CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GIS DGE BSGOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, ,DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA NGO MA LDOG PAR, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA THA SHAL BA @010B THUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO'I 'KHOR BCAS BYAMS SHING BZOD GSOL, ,'ONG KYANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
